briefTitle: An Investigational Study to Evaluate Experimental Medication BMS-986165 Compared to Placebo in Participants With Plaque Psoriasis (POETYK-PSO-3) in Mainland China, Taiwan, and South Korea
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of BMS-986165 in Subjects With Moderate-to-Severe Plaque Psoriasis
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the experimental medication BMS-986165 compared to placebo in participants with moderate to severe plaque psoriasis in mainland China, Taiwan, and South Korea

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants With sPGA Response of 0 or 1
